# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Test-Connection anyHostWhoWillTimeout
# Press Ctrl + C immediately
```

# Expected behavior

```none
The command is immediately cancelled and the prompt returns.
```

# Actual behavior

```none
The current ping finishes timing out before the command is cancelled.
```

# Environment data

```none

```
